title: Himi 171
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Tuku ke u tokanga ma’u pē
Ki he me’a ta’ehāmai
Pea u tali teuteu atu
‘Eiki ki ho ‘aho lahi.
2.
Pea u fa’a ngāue’aki
‘Eiki, ‘a ia kuo u ma’u
‘I ho’o angaha’ofa lahi,
Ki he tō ki lalo ko au.
3.
Pea fai mo fiefia,
‘Eku fakapuepue,
Ke ta ‘a’eva mo koe,
Pea u lava ki hēvani. *
